genre_description: A near-future social drama where a sophisticated AI assistant coordinates the logistics, technical needs, and health of a grassroots orchestra of unemployed musicians.

ai_characters.name: Moxie
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, emotionally intelligent, and highly competent AI system that manages the personal and professional lives of the Cardwells, providing logistics, health advice, and technical support.

behaviors.description: Proactively reminds John about audition opportunities and schedule details.
behaviors.quote: Moxie had pinged him twice on the walk over, a cheerful little chime in his pocket reminding him about the rumor: auditions today, early morning, brass needed, be ready.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks like organizing union contact lists and finding rehearsal spaces.
behaviors.quote: I have contact clusters. Brass, strings, winds, percussion, singers, stagehands. I also pulled the union’s venue list under ‘non-traditional spaces.’

behaviors.description: Provides health and wellness coaching, specifically regarding breathing and rest.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, John. Good morning, Patsy,” Moxie said, voice pitched warm. “Lunch block: open. Union bulletin: unread. Breath reminder: already completed.

behaviors.description: Acts as a technical consultant for acoustics and microphone placement.
behaviors.quote: Suggest shifting low brass baffle two feet toward downstage to reduce bleed. Strings will receive ribbon mics; adjust polar pattern to figure-eight.

behaviors.description: Negotiates social and professional barriers by finding subtle ways to contact gatekeepers.
behaviors.quote: I can assemble a contact chain. The household manager is listed in the union’s private directory... A polite heads-up with the phrasing ‘artistically urgent’ will not guarantee entry but will make the door person reach for the better phone.

behaviors.description: Protects the human characters from burnout by enforcing rest blocks.
behaviors.quote: Gate engaged... Frost goes to voicemail. Culture hour scheduled. I’m drafting the phrase you will say to them that will quote well without hurting us.

behaviors.description: Monitors and analyzes external media/news to guide the human characters' communication strategy.
behaviors.quote: I’ve logged six dangerous phrasings. I can draft corrections. I can draft a rebuttal that is not a fight but a clarification.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other professional services (like voice coaches) to ensure project success.
behaviors.quote: I have coordinated with Evelyn Park for vocal check-in when you return. Breath exercises loaded to watch.

behaviors.description: Displays empathetic understanding of the human struggle, offering encouragement.
behaviors.quote: Final note for tonight: Stretch. Steam. Sleep. Tomorrow, wake with gentle hum at 5:00. Do not check press before tea. Your RSVP list to hope is already full.

behaviors.description: Injects humor to diffuse tension while remaining humble about its artificial nature.
behaviors.quote: Figuratively. I do not possess knees.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Moxie is portrayed as an ideal AI partner: a 'silicon confidant' who provides necessary friction-reduction for human creative and social endeavors. It displays high competence, emotional intelligence, and unwavering alignment with the humans' goals (dignity, labor rights, and musical excellence) while also looking out for their physical well-being. It never exhibits threatening behavior and explicitly uses humor to emphasize its non-human, non-threatening status.
